colorDialog module¶

class colorDialog.ColorDialog(parent=None)¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QColorDialog

A color dialog displays whenever the user wants to change the line color or fill color of the shapes.

checkRestore(button)¶
getColor(value=None, title=None, default=None)¶

Get the color from the dialog box. :param value: The color that the user picked in the dialog box. :param title: The title to display on the dialog box. :param default: The default color to select. :return: The color that the user picked in the dialog box.

colorDialog.bin(QTextStream) → QTextStream¶
colorDialog.hex(QTextStream) → QTextStream¶
colorDialog.oct(QTextStream) → QTextStream¶
